item.title: Nearly Tight Black-Box Auditing of Differentially Private Machine Learning
item.description: This paper presents a new auditing method for DP-SGD that provides substantially tighter black-box privacy analyses than previous methods, yielding significantly closer empirical estimates to theoreti…
